markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Jungle Drake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2960)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Believed to be related to [horned dragons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=401), jungle drakes are dangerous hunters equipped with a debilitating venom delivered by a large barbed stinger or their noxious phlegm. Their wings are equipped with vestigial claws that allow them to deftly maneuver through thick jungle foliage both in flight and on foot. Jungle drakes prefer to ambush their prey using hit-and-run tactics, picking off the weakest members of a group and dragging their victims off to finish their meals as they please. Rampages of jungle drakes will often drag prey in many directions to divide pursuit.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Jungle_Drake.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Jungle Drake](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2960)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Dragon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=581" />
<trait label="Wood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=508" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 130 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -1

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +11 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 90

</row>

**Immunities**
[disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696)

**Twisting Tail** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within reach of the jungle drake's stinger uses a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=658) action or leaves a square during a move action they're using; **Effect** The jungle drake Strikes the target with their stinger. If it hits, the jungle drake [disrupts](/Rules.aspx?ID=394) the creature's action.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 50 feet; forest passage

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +17,
**Damage** 2d10+7 piercing plus Predatory Grab

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +17 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+7 piercing plus jungle drake venom

**Draconic Frenzy** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The jungle drake makes one fangs Strike and two stinger Strikes in any order.

**Forest Passage**   The jungle drake ignores [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) caused by plants, such as bushes, vines, and undergrowth. Even plants manipulated by magic don't impede their progress.

**Jungle Drake Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 24 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

**Predatory Grab** <actions string="Single Action" />  As [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45), but the jungle drake's Grab doesn't end if they move away. Instead, they carry the [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) creature with them. A jungle drake can't [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312) while grabbing a creature unless that creature can also Fly.

**Speed Surge** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) **Frequency** three times per day; **Effect** The jungle drake Strides or Flies twice.

**Spit Venom** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) A jungle drake can spit a sticky glob of their venom to a range of 50 feet that explodes in a 10-foot burst. Those in the burst must succeed at a DC 24 Reflex save or be exposed to jungle drake venom. The jungle drake can't use Spit Venom again for 1d6 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-404" />
name: Jungle Drake
